resources.string: Simply point your camera to any direction and tap on the scan button. Once the objects are identified, they will be read aloud. Sign in with a Google account in the settings section to leverage cloud processing and improve detection accuracy. Double tap near the middle of the screen to start analysis.
This app requires camera access to identify surrounding objects. Please click grant permissions button below if you\'d like to continue.
This app requires camera access to identify surrounding objects. Please click grant permissions button if you\'d like to continue.
